title: Celestial Sparkle Gold Bangles - Gaaju
materials: High-quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Features a light Hyderabadi Polish for a subtle sheen.
features: Delicate bangle design featuring spaced-out square motifs adorned with sparkling Cubic Zirconia stones. The slender gold bands offer a minimalist aesthetic with a touch of traditional grace. The setting is a bezel setting, ensuring each CZ is securely placed and catches the light beautifully.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift. Suitable for small celebrations or as an elegant addition to a formal ensemble. Can be worn for functions like Sankranthi or Diwali.
description: Elegantly simple yet captivating. The combination of high-quality CZ stones and 22K gold provides a luxurious look without compromising on comfort. The bangles are designed to be durable and withstand daily wear. Modern design elements complement traditional South Indian attire beautifully.
